ygData.subject: RE: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Druids have DoT s that are FAR more mana efficient than ours.  At least until we get envenomed breath at 24.  This last patch even increased the power of their
ygData.messageBody:
Druids have DoT's that are FAR more mana efficient than ours. At least
until we get envenomed breath at 24. This last patch even increased the
power of their DoT's.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Omeg Felligan [SMTP:omeg_felligan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 11:56 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Shaman's are the best kiters right? B/c they get SoW at 9th, and
> Druids
> don't get it till 14th...or are the Druid DOTs that much better?
>
> hmmm...maybe I will stick with the shaman :).
>
> Omeg
